Service Details: - Represents the 8-member communities that include Okanagan Indian Band, Upper Nicola Band, Westbank First Nation, Penticton Indian Band, Osoyoos Indian Band and Lower and Upper Similkameen Indian Bands and the Colville Confederated Tribes on areas of common concern- Works collectively to advance and assert Okanagan Nation Title and Rights over the Okanagan Nation Territory
Address & Map: 3535 Hwy Old Okanagan, #101West Kelowna, BC     V4T 3L7
Major Intersection: Old Okanagan Hwy and Butt Rd
